name: Kenka Bancho Otome: Kanzenmuketsu no My Honey
name_original: Kenka Bancho Otome: Kanzenmuketsu no My Honey
description: For as long as she's been aware, the heroine, without a single relative, lived under care of the state. Both of her parents' faces were unknown to her. In front of this heroine, a young boy appeared. The young boy's name was "Hikaru". It appeared that he was the heroine's twin brother, separated at birth. He had a proposal for the heroine.
